title: Power Type
description:
Power Types are what grants functionality to your origins! Each power has a type, specified with a type field in the JSON. Which type a power is defines which other fields it requires and supports.
Type: 'origins:attribute_modify_transfer'
- Transfers the value of an attribute modifier from a specified attribute to a specified power class that extends the ValueModifyingPower super-class.

class.description:
The ID of the class to transfer the value of an attribute modifier to.
See Value Modifying Power Classes for possible values.

attribute.description: The namespace and ID of the attribute to get the value from.

multiplier.description: Determines the multiplier for the value.
